escrow_amount.description: The required escrow amount, in the default denom (utgd)

escrow_pending.description: The pending escrow amount, if any

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

grace_ends_at.description: Timestamp (seconds) when the pending escrow is enforced

allow_end_early.description: If true, and absolute threshold and quorum are met, we can end before voting period finished

voting_period.description: Length of voting period in days. Also used to define when escrow_pending is enforced.
